snippet: A federal judge has rejected an effort by American Airlines to quickly cut off benefits for many of its retirees. American, which is in bankruptcy, wants retirees who wish to keep their benefits to pay all the cost.
abstract: United States Bankruptcy Court Judge Sean H Lane in New York rejects effort by former American Airlines parent AMR Corporation to quickly cut off benefits for many of its retirees; grants request for group of nonunion workers.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge has rejected an effort by American Airlines to quickly cut off benefits for many of its retirees. American, which is in bankruptcy, wants retirees who wish to keep their benefits to pay all the cost.

headline.main: Effort by American Airlines to Cut Benefits Fails
headline.print_headline: Effort by American Airlines to Cut Benefits Fails
